attributes.action: intervene to prevent further downgrading and cutbacks to Portree Community Hospital, Isle of Skye.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The hospital currently has twelve beds and serves a remote rural population who are over 125 miles away from the nearest District General Hospital.
In particular we request:
1. Retention of acute medical services at Portree Hospital.
2. Reintroduction of twenty-four hour emergency care based at the hospital.
3. Reinstatement of the six beds removed last year.
4. Return to safe staffing levels in the interests of patient safety and staff wellbeing.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
